DATA.description: Access to the Activity Stream, Generate and read postings
DATA.name: Activity Stream

DATA.description: If the Shared Object Lifecycle is used to mark objects every user needs this feature. The feature is checked at the start of the system when the Shared Object Lifecycle functionality is initialized.
DATA.name: Enable Shared Object Lifecycle

DATA.description: Functionality that every user/process can use without having further features. Necessary for all  licensed processes (cdbsrv, powerscript, ...)
DATA.name: Base Functionality

DATA.description: Checking access to an object that might depend on an organizational context. This is the feature for organizational contexts defined by the customer. The contexts that are part of the cs or 3rd-Party packages will define their own features.
DATA.name: AccessSystem with OrgContext

DATA.description: Allows the user to start a client against an EdgeServer.
DATA.name: EdgeServer Client

DATA.description:
Feature that allows the user to add operations to classes or to customize existing ones, e.g. changing the dialog of the operation.
Includes the configuration of component user exits.
DATA.name: Developing Applications Adding Operations

DATA.description: Create new Users and assign them to roles.
DATA.name: Managing Users

DATA.description: Administer user interface visible appearance (dialogues, tables,browser, menues, navigation tree, toolbar, eLink-Panels, decompositions)
DATA.name: Platform: GUI Master Data Write

DATA.description: Read access to files
DATA.name: Platform: Reading Files

DATA.description: Create, modify or delete files
DATA.name: Platform: Modifying Files

DATA.description:
Add new Filetypes to the system or change existing ones.
Configure the mapping of file properties to system attributes
DATA.name: Platform: Customizing File Handling

DATA.description: Necessary whenever the cdbsrv process is need, e.g. for interactive sessions (CDB/Win, WebUI) and for using the REST-API.
DATA.name: Platform: Running Server

DATA.description: Setting the transfer times of asynchronous file replication
DATA.name: Platform: Administration of asynchronous file replication

DATA.description: Creating or Modifying Access Domain Groups, Access Profiles. Orgamosational contexts.
DATA.name: Platform: Access System Configuration

DATA.description: Creation of new common roles.
DATA.name: Platform: Access System - Creating Roles

DATA.description: Exceptional access to objects
DATA.name: Platform: Access System - Using exceptional access

DATA.description: Create or change Object Life Cycles
DATA.name: Platform: Object Life Cycles

DATA.description: Allows to create new classes or views. Specify Drag & Drop Behaviour between classes. Also allows to add Joins to existing classes.
DATA.name: Platform: Data Dictionary - Creating custom classes.

DATA.description: Allows to create new relationships.
DATA.name: Platform: Data Dictionary - Creating relationships

DATA.description: Allows to define new structure definitions and change existing ones.
DATA.name: Platform: Data Dictionary - Define presentation of structures

DATA.description: Allows to change existing classes, e.g. add fields or change the label of fields.
DATA.name: Platform: Data Dictionary - Customize existing classes

DATA.description: Allows to use OpenID Connect based authentication of users and services.
DATA.name: OpenID Connect Support

DATA.description: Reading or searching for informations assigned to an object by the facet-mechanism.  Note that this feature does not include subject characteristic data assigned to a part.
DATA.name: Facets: Master Data Read

DATA.description: Creating, Changing, ... informations assigned to an object by the facet-mechanism. Note that this feature does not include subject characteristic data assigned to a part.
DATA.name: Facets: Master Data Write

DATA.description: Reading or searching for informations assigned to a part using subject characteristics
DATA.name: SML: Master Data Read

DATA.description: Create new facets
DATA.name: Facets: Creating, Changing and Deleting facet classes

DATA.description: Allows integrations to connect to the server using the CAD/Talk protocol. This affects every integration, e.g. CAD-Integrations, ERP-Integrations, Office-Integration, ...
DATA.name: CAD/Talk: Base Functionality

DATA.description:
Allows integrations to use functions designed for CAD-Integrations, e.g. the protocol-functions
CAD_ZVS_RAHMEN_LADEN (to fill a frame)
CAD_NEW_VERSIONS (to see newer versions of documents)
CAD_ZVS_SAVERIGHT (access check)
DATA.name: CAD/Talk: MDM Functionality

DATA.description:
Allows integrations to use functions designed to handle boms, e.g. the protocol-functions
CAD_STL_SENDE_BOM (transfer a bom from integration to cdb)
CAD_STL_AUSFUELLEN (special function to get bom data to fill a frame)
DATA.name: CAD/Talk: STL Functionality

DATA.description:
Allows integrations to use functions designed to handle subject characteristic data, e.g. the protocol-functions
CAD_SML_INFO (Retrieve info about an SC)
DATA.name: CAD/Talk: SML Functionality

DATA.description: Change the definition of frames, configure messages used by an integration
DATA.name: CAD/Talk: Create and modify frames
